title: More than a photoreceptor: aureochromes are intrinsic to the diatom light-regulated transcriptional network
content: This article comments on:Im SH, Lepetit B, Mosesso N, Shrestha S, Weiss L, Nymark M, Roellig R, Wilhelm C, Isono E, Kroth PG. 2024. Identification of promoter targets by Aureochrome 1a in the diatom Phaeodactylum tricornutum. Journal of Experimental Botany 75, 1834â€“1851.
